abstract: Sharing documents with your coworkers via Google Docs sure is convenient. But one little typo can turn into a big security problem.
snippet: Sharing documents with your coworkers via Google Docs sure is convenient. But one little typo can turn into a big security problem.
lead_paragraph: Sharing documents with your co-workers via Google Docs sure is convenient. It can also be hazardous. Make one little typo and your sensitive data could fall into the hands of… someone like me.

headline.main: I’m in Your Google Docs, Reading Your Spreadsheets
